messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re:Healing/ nursing.
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 27/02/2005 18:50:34 Pacific Standard Time, hoffmanwilson@yahoo.com writes: Before I had a nursing 7 yo, I couldn t imagine a nursing 7 yo.
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 27/02/2005 18:50:34 Pacific Standard Time,
hoffmanwilson@... writes:


Before I had a nursing 7 yo, I couldn't imagine a
nursing 7 yo. Now it doesn't seem any weirder than a
nursing 1 yo or a nursing 4 yo. It just still seems
like nurturing and cuddling and offering comfort.
Dana




Dana, it is so good to hear this. My dd is only 3.5 and I can't imagine not
nursing her. Ds nursed till he was 5.5 and I had to wean him cause I was
pregnant and it drove me wild with discomfort. He still mourns that, he is 9.4 now,
and last night said if he could remember how, he would nurse again! I can't
imagine as he is 5'3" and 185 lbs. But i wish he could have weaned when he was
ready, not when I needed him to.
Nancy in BC


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
